docs.title: GS3-SFP-232-GE
docs.text: The GLBB Secure Smart Serial (GS3) is a small form factor console server, purpose-built for serial communication via the TIA-232 (RS-232) standard.

docs.title: Our Company
docs.text:
• Company Name: GLBB Japan K.K.
  • Address: 225-1 Hamagawa, Chatan-cho, Nakagami-gun, Okinawa 904-0112
  • Contact Information: gs3techsupport@glbb.jp

docs.title: Serial Commands
docs.text: The serial commands section allows users to configure the serial communication settings of the GS3.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Configures the baud rate. The default is set to 115200.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
[admin@ssh -to -serial]>serial baudrate 9600
UART Config - Base: 0x4000D000
Clock: 120000000 Hz
Baud: 9600
Data Size: 8
Parity: N
Stop Bits: 1
Flow Control: N
Transmit Delay: 100 ms
Serial baud rate set to 9600.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Configures the data size, with a range of 5 to 8 bits.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
[admin@ssh-to-serial]>serial datasize 5
UART Config - Base: 0x4000D000
 Clock: 120000000 Hz
 Baud: 9600
 Data Size: 5
 Parity: N
 Stop Bits: 1
 Flow Control: N
 Transmit Delay: 100 ms
Serial data size set to 5 bits.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
[admin@ssh-to-serial]>serial parity odd
UART Config - Base: 0x4000D000
 Clock: 120000000 Hz
 Baud: 115200
 Data Size: 8
 Parity: O
 Stop Bits: 1
 Flow Control: N
 Transmit Delay: 100 ms
Serial parity set to O.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
[admin@ssh-to-serial]>serial show
UART Config - Base：0x4000D000
 Clock：120000000 Hz
 Baud：115200
 Data Size：8
 Parity：N
 Stop Bits：1
 Flow Control：N
 Transmit Delay：0 ms
Current configuration displayed.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Configures the number of stop bits (either 1 or 2).

docs.title: Example
docs.text: [admin@ssh-to-serial]>serial stopbits 1 UART Config - Base: 0x4000D000 Clock: 120000000 Hz Baud: 9600 Data Size: 5 Parity: N Stop Bits: 1 Flow Control: N Transmit Delay: 100 ms Serial stop bits set to 1.S
